name: Perkele!: Suomi 100 Vuotta
description:
Perkele!: Suomi 100 Vuotta is a collection of three games created in celebration of the 100 year anniversary of Finland's independence from Russia. The games included are:
  • Nakkikioskitappelu (Snack Bar Fight): a 1-on-1 2D fighting game were you try to buy a snack but end up getting into drunken fights after the bar has closed for the night. The game can be played against the AI or against a second player.
  • Saimaannorpan Kosto (Saimaa Ringed Seal's Revenge): a side-scrolling shooter were you control a Saimaa ringed seal that can shoot lazers from its eyes. Your goal is to kill the humans who are polluting Lake Saimaa.
  • Talvisota (Winter War): a shooting gallery like Duck Hunt which requires the NES Zapper. Your goal is to shoot the Russian soldiers that are trying to invade Finland while avoiding friendly troops.
